intent_atoms.description: Curated multi-source fixture catalog with licensing, download, and storage guidance.
Extend generate_fixtures.py to download fixtures from the curated manifest with checksum verification and license mirroring.
Execute macOS DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export, and hardware-dependent QA following the release readiness runbook.
Execute the random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.
